meanings.sent1: During the interpandemic period, people focus on staying healthy.
meanings.sent2: The hospital prepared for the interpandemic phase by stocking up on supplies.
meanings.sent3: The interpandemic calm allowed for a break from constant worry.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like an interpandemic ray of sunshine in a stormy world.
meanings.sent5: The interpandemic lull was a welcome relief after the chaos of the pandemic.

meanings.definition: Relating to the period between pandemics.
meanings.sent1: Scientists study the interpandemic trends to better understand outbreaks.
meanings.sent2: The government implemented new policies to handle interpandemic situations.
meanings.sent3: The interpandemic discussions at the conference were surprisingly lively.
meanings.sent4: His interpandemic approach to problem-solving was both cautious and effective.
meanings.sent5: The interpandemic period was a time of preparation and anticipation for what might come next.
